title: Greece Elects New President Despite MPs' Walkout Over Train Crash | Balkan Insight
snippet: Election by parliament of Konstantinos Tasoulas as Greece's new president was marred by walk-outs by leftist opposition parties, which accuse him of involvement in an alleged government cover-up over the 2023 Tempi train crash.

title: Presidential Election 2025 Greece
snippet: Konstantinos Tasoulas is elected President of Greece

title: President of Greece - Wikipedia
snippet: The president of Greece, officially the president of the Hellenic Republic (Greek: Πρόεδρος της Ελληνικής Δημοκρατίας, romanized: Próedros tis Ellinikís Dimokratías), commonly referred to in Greek as the president of the Republic (Πρόεδρος της Δημοκρατίας, Próedros tis Dimokratías, ΠτΔ), is the head of state of Greece.

title: Greek lawmakers elect former parliament speaker Constantine Tassoulas as president | Euronews
snippet: Newly elected President Constantine Tassoulas waits to receive the results of the fourth round of voting at the parliament in Athens, 12 February 2025 - AP Photo ... Greek lawmakers have elected a former parliament speaker and leading advocate ...

title: Katerina Sakellaropoulou - Wikipedia
snippet: She was elected by the Hellenic Parliament to succeed Prokopis Pavlopoulos on 22 January 2020. Prior to her election as president, Sakellaropoulou served as president of the Council of State, the highest administrative court of Greece.
